==== Hardware Overview ====
* Pentium M (Dothan) 1.7GHz CPU
* 1518MB PC2700 DDR SDRAM
* 80GB 5400RPM hard drive
* ATI Radeon Mobility 9600 with 64MB memory
* 15" 1400x1050 LCD
* DVD-ROM/CD-RW combo drive
* Intel AC`97 Audio
* Intel PRO/1000 Gigabit NIC
* Intel PRO/Wireless 2200 802.11b/g WiFi NIC
* Integrated 56k modem
